title.rendered: Sydney vs Melbourne, Australian T20 League, 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Probable XI for Sydney: Alex Hales, Matthew Gilkes (wk), Rilee Rossouw, Alex Ross, Oliver Davies/Baxter Holt, Ben Cutting, Daniel Sams, Jason Sangha (c), Chris Green, Gurinder Sandhu, Nathan McAndrew

Probable XI for Melbourne: Marcus Stoinis, Nick Larkin, Joe Clarke (wk), Hilton Cartwright, Joe Burns, Beau Webster, Nathan Coulter-Nile/Tom Rogers, Trent Boult, Adam Zampa (c), Luke Wood, Clint Hinchliffe

Pitch Report

Venue: Manuka Oval, Canberra

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 153

2nd innings average score: 148

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Decent batting wicket.

Weather: Clear.

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

As far as all-rounders are concerned, Sydney have more depth and firepower as compared to Melbourne.

Along with Marcus Stoinis, Hilton Cartwright has the ability to clear the ropes at regular intervals. He was the highest six-hitter (22) for his side in 2021.

In the last 2 games of the 2021 edition at the Manuka Oval, only 3 out of 26 wickets belonged to the spinners.
